instructions: Tap the Compose button at the top of the screen to start a new message, or tap an existing message. Enter the phone number, contact name, or Apple ID of each recipient. Or, tap the Add button , then choose contacts. Tap the text field, type your message, then tap the Send button to send. A blue send button indicates the message will be sent with iMessage; a green send button indicates the message will be sent with SMS/MMS, or your cellular service. An alert Alert badge appears if a message can t be sent. Tap the alert to try sending the message again.
